item.dc:creator: troyh
item.content:encoded: Had to run into Seattle this morning. My SIM in my cell phone mysteriously died. Nobody can tell me why SIMs suddenly die, but T-Mobile confirms they do. Dropped Gay's car off at the shop to fix a couple recalls we never got around to having done. Lunch at Elliot Bay Brewery, then picked up some new CDs: Radiohead's Hail To The Thief, Grandaddy's Sumday and Yo La Tengo's Summer Sun before hopping on the ferry home.
